div.p: An entity (usually a Practitioner, Patient, or Organization but potentially a device or other entity) that participates in a healthcare task or activity. The participant is not necessarily the performer, and the role (ParticipationType), the ParticipationPeriod, and other details of the participation are by the Participation structure.
